timeline.bodyText:
My concern with short hashes is then we cannot go to etherscan from the log.  I do this fairly frequently when analyzing short lived forks.
Perhaps put the peers not at the end and making the other numbers fixed width?
timeline.author: shemnon

replies.bodyText: What about printing out an additional debug level log info with the full hash? My impression is that the full details are too much on info log level.
replies.author: q9f

replies.bodyText: Debug is very noisy.  Besu has had it at info since we started logging these lines.
replies.author: shemnon
